name: happiness market
description:
This is a 2D simulation and management game.

Players need to build stores and purchase goods to attract customers for consumption.
There are 18 different types of buildings that can be constructed.

In addition to customers, there will be troublemakers like thieves and robbers.
Players can use employees, specifically security guards, to maintain order.

Players can also raise small animals.
There are 22 different types of small animals and they have distinct abilities, such as finding money.

Players need to manage their stores and build relationships with other shopping centers to attract hunters to eliminate monsters.
